languages.text: "И, конечно, я слежу за тем, чтобы миры протектората подготавливали десятину в срок. На моем веку никто и никогда не скажет, что династия запятнала себя задержкой в выплате священной подати!"

"And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"
languages.original_text: "И, конечно, я слежу за тем, чтобы миры протектората подготавливали десятину в срок. На моем веку никто и никогда не скажет, что династия запятнала себя задержкой в выплате священной подати!"

traits.locale_text: "And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

"And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

"And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

"And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

"And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

languages.text: 「そしてもちろん、私は保護領の惑星が時間通りに租税を準備するよう取り計らっています。私が生きている間に、王朝が聖なる租税が遅れたことで不名誉を被ったなどと言わせはしません！」
languages.original_text: "And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

traits.locale_text: 「そしてもちろん、私は保護領の惑星が時間通りに租税を準備するよう取り計らっています。私が生きている間に、王朝が聖なる租税が遅れたことで不名誉を被ったなどと言わせはしません！」

languages.text: "Und natürlich sorge ich dafür, dass die Welten des Protektorats ihre Zehnt termingerecht vorbereiten. Niemand soll zeit meines Lebens sagen, die Dynastie hätte durch späte Bezahlung des heiligen Tributs an Ehre eingebüßt!"
languages.original_text: "And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

traits.locale_text: "Und natürlich sorge ich dafür, dass die Welten des Protektorats ihre Zehnt termingerecht vorbereiten. Niemand soll zeit meines Lebens sagen, die Dynastie hätte durch späte Bezahlung des heiligen Tributs an Ehre eingebüßt!"

languages.text: "Elbette protektoranın dünyalarının aşarlarını vaktinde hazırlamalarını bizzat temin ederim. Ben hayatta oldukça kutsal haraçta gecikme yüzünden hanedanlığın adına leke sürüldüğünü kimse duymayacak!"
languages.original_text: "And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

traits.locale_text: "Elbette, protektoranın dünyalarının aşarlarını vaktinde hazırlamalarını bizzat temin ederim. Ben hayatta oldukça kutsal haraçta gecikme yüzünden hanedanlığın adına leke sürüldüğünü kimse duymayacak!"

languages.text: «Y, por supuesto, exijo que los mundos del protectorado preparen el diezmo de forma puntual. ¡Que nadie pueda decir mientras yo viva que la dinastía se ha rebajado a pagar con retraso el sagrado tributo!».
languages.original_text: "And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

traits.locale_text: «Y, por supuesto, exijo que los mundos del protectorado preparen el diezmo de forma puntual. ¡Que nadie pueda decir mientras yo viva que la dinastía se ha rebajado a pagar con retraso el sagrado tributo!».

languages.text: “当然，我还要确保王朝的所有世界按时按量准备好什一税。在我的有生之年，我不希望冯·瓦兰修斯王朝只因未能按时缴纳什一税，便落得被人诋毁的下场！”
languages.original_text: "And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

traits.locale_text: “当然，我还要确保王朝的所有世界按时按量准备好什一税。在我的有生之年，我不希望冯·瓦兰修斯王朝只因未能按时缴纳什一税，便落得被人诋毁的下场！”

languages.text: « Et bien sûr, je m'assure que les planètes du protectorat versent leur dîme en temps et en heure. Tant que je vivrai, personne ne pourra dire que la dynastie s'est déshonorée en tardant à payer le tribut sacré ! »
languages.original_text: "And, of course, I ensure that the protectorate's worlds prepare their tithe in a timely fashion. Let none ever say in my lifetime that the dynasty has disgraced itself with a late payment of the sacred tribute!"

traits.locale_text: « Et bien sûr, je m'assure que les planètes du protectorat versent leur dîme en temps et en heure. Tant que je vivrai, personne ne pourra dire que la dynastie s'est déshonorée en tardant à payer le tribut sacré ! »
